intent: Reorganize the user's Pictures folder by moving image files into YEAR/MONTH sub‑directories based on their EXIF capture date, then generate a summary report of the number of files moved per month.

plan.command:
find . -type f \( -iname "*.jpg" -o -iname "*.jpeg" -o -iname "*.png" \) -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' img; do
  DATE=$(exiftool -d "%Y/%m" -DateTimeOriginal -s -s -s "$img" 2>/dev/null)
  if [ -z "$DATE" ]; then
    DATE="unknown/unknown"
  fi
  DEST="$(pwd)/$DATE"
  mkdir -p "$DEST"
  mv "$img" "$DEST/"
  echo "$DEST" >> .move_log
 done

intent: Find duplicate files in /srv/data based on SHA256 checksum, list duplicate groups, and replace each duplicate with a hard link to a single retained copy.

plan.command: cd /srv/data && find . -type f -exec sha256sum {} + | sort | awk 'BEGIN{prev=""} {if($1==prev){print $2} else {if(NR>1){print "---"} prev=$1}}' > /tmp/dup_checksums.txt
for f in /tmp/dup_group_*.txt; do master=$(head -n1 "$f"); while read dup; do [ "$dup" = "$master" ] && continue; rm -f "$dup" && ln "$master" "$dup"; done < <(tail -n +2 "$f"); done
